pinyin: ren4 zhi1 shen2 jing1 xin1 li3 xue2

sentences.english: They found that the higher their level of social interaction, the better their cognitive functioning.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現，社會交往越多的人認知表現越好。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the needs of the families of hearing-impaired children.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解聽障兒童家長對康復認知與需求情況。

sentences.english: Stay ahead and achieve low cost and superior customer attractiveness.
sentences.chinese: 永居上游，實現低成本與客戶的高認知度。

sentences.english: Perhaps the space of possible cognition is our space.
sentences.chinese: 也許那可能存在的認知空間就是我們的空間。

sentences.english: Image-wise, it still lacks a clear identity.
sentences.chinese: 品牌認知方面，它仍然缺乏清晰的定義。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of early intervention on high-risk infants'cognitive development.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討早期干預對高危兒認知發育的影響。

sentences.english: This has led to a more comprehensive neurobiological paradigm for the system of cognitive therapy.
sentences.chinese: 指引着認知治療系統更全面的神經生物學範式。

sentences.english: Knowledge is a cognizance of basic impersonality.
sentences.chinese: 知識是一種具有客觀基礎的認知。

sentences.english: One of the lingering challenges in cognitive psychology is the evolution of language.
sentences.chinese: 認知心理學久而未決的挑戰之一便是語言的進化。

sentences.english: Lower B12 levels have been associated with cognitive impairment.
sentences.chinese: 低的維生素B12水平與認知損傷相關。

sentences.english: Reciprocal teaching is a model of inactive learning's application in reading comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 交互教學就是元認知缺陷觀應用於閱讀教學的典範。

sentences.english: This technique revolves around the theory of cognitive dissonance.
sentences.chinese: 這個技巧與認知悔悟有關。

sentences.english: In negative modals, "Deny" modal is the strongest cognitive negation.
sentences.chinese: 在負的模態詞中，“拒斥”是最強的認知否定。

sentences.english: Subjective well-being consists of cognitive and affective components.
sentences.chinese: 主觀幸福感由認知和情感兩個成分構成。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the status of perceiving of self-medication among university students.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解大學生自我藥療認知情況。

definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
